targetAudience.question: Who is your target audience?
targetAudience.answer: My target audience is beginner developers, people who want to venture into the world of programming, and clients looking for custom projects. I also offer tips and guidance to improve resumes and stand out in the market.

projectTimeAndCost.question: What is the average timeline and cost of a project?
projectTimeAndCost.answer: Simple projects are usually completed within 1 to 2 weeks, while complex projects can take 1 to 3 months. For detailed information about costs, please contact me directly.
